text: Ezɨ ia kamaghɨn Godɨn azangsɨsi, “Manmagh amizɨ, nɨ en ofaba isir puvatɨ?” Bizir kamɨn mɨngarim kamakɨn, Ikiavɨra Itir God fo, nɨ fomɨra uan mugamra ikia, amuimɨn ikiasa Godɨn damazimɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavim gamigha ghaze, nɨ amizir kam ateghan kogham. Amizim, kar nɨn roroam. Ezɨ puvatɨ, nɨ akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam abigha gɨfa.
